participants.name:
Desiree Martinez
(Ford)
participants.url: Nerdy Panda (Owner) at Pink Media, LLC

messages.message:
Brian
Desiree,

My mother, Linda McVey referred me to your business Pink Media.  I am working on a startup Sitewatch, and we would like to start getting some attention and improve our SEO ranking, she thought you would be able to help.  We would like to improve some of the content and wording of our website and develop our presence online.  Our website is https://sitewat.ch, please contact me at your earliest convenience by e-mail (bjcullinan@gmail.com) and we can set up a time to meet over phone (4804660856) or in person.

Thank you,
-Brian
Welcome
Sitewatch is your own personal search engine that finds problems with your website before hackers use them to break in. Here are some companies that have benefited from Sitewatch:
sitewat.ch

Hey Brian! I left you a voicemail today to talk, but I wanted to connect with you here as well. My boyfriend works for an awesome SEO company and think he would be the best fit for what you described above. 

So you know, my company does social media marketing and graphic design. If you ever need that please let me know.

Call me to schedule a time to talk.3038323019
Hey I have a question for you: what do you know about Facebook apps and coding for them?

Brian
I can write a Facebook App.  I haven't written one, but it looks really easy.

Would you be open to having a new conversation together. I have created Pink Engagements (www.pinkengagements.com) and would like to turn it into an app similar to www.pagemodo.com

Let me know if you are interested and we can schedule a conversation. Additionally, I am trying to keep this on the DL so please don't share with others.

Desiree
Pink Engagments
I know you are incredibly excited and looking forward to a great life with the person you love. But first comes the wedding. Are you ready?
pinkengagements.com

have you gotten to look at that stuff I sent?
how I things with getting the pricing all worked out so we can get your rocking with internet marketing

Brian
Yes, thank you.  We are working hard so it might be a few months.  We may have to rebrand because of trademarking issues.
